channel.title: Decipher-RSPS Flawless Uptime. Were Back Old Character Files
channel.description:
Welcome To Decipher-RSPS.. ---------->> Website is still Under Developing. Trying To Get Old Host-Domain Back. Fow Now Come Play At Us Client! We See U All Online! [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/220769637/Decipher-RSPS.jar]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/220769637/Decipher-RSPS.jar[/url]
Decipher is an Economy server:
This basically means there's no spawning and any items people obtain will have been earned through PVM or from PKing. This means our items will have value, making everything more fun, giving players something to aim for and of course making it so much better when you finally get that kill for rare items. There are tons of different ways to exchange your items including specific market areas, clan chats, and even a dedicated section on forums. Being a new server we want to get our economy right the first time. To ensure we achieve this we have made drop rates at a perfect level to maintain item drops for PvMers, but also to give just enough that we're not flooded with items and massive inflation like you see on most other private servers.
What Decipher is about:
Decipher community is like no other! As soon as you join you will notice our active wilderness, active forums, and active PvMing and Clanning communities. Here at Decipher RSPS, we don’t like to mess around, we want to bring you the players the best possible experience that we can give you.
Our community gives a warm welcome to all new players, and presents them with many opportunity to get involded with activities and get to know existing members. We have many events and tournaments in and out of the wilderness that makes this possible. These can be anything from Clan based PKing, to a simple games of Hide and Seek.
The Decipher Staff Team:
All of Decipher staff are hand-picked based off applications anyone is free to submit. These application then get voted on by our staff team and those few that provide the best application will get a chance to prove them selves by starting as a Server Support member. Not only do we make sure we have staff from EVERY different time zone. We make sure we have the nicest most helpful staff available for you. Many of our staff all have previous experience from other major private Server, mainly Near Reality, which means you get professional support and help when every you may need it.
Decipher Development & Progress:
The development team here at Decipher knows quality updates have to come from what the community wants. Once you’ve become a part of the spectacular Decipher community, you’ll notice weekly updates, with content polls that you can vote on to bring what you want and enjoy into the game. Alternatively you can put your ideas forward as suggestions on our forums and have your voice heard and see your ideas implemented if fellow players support you.
Welcome, to the server
Click here to view the original image of 764x504px.

Click here to view the original image of 774x562px.
Decipher is one of the newest upcoming server, based off shards. We deliver great game play, as well as a great community. We aren't like most server's where we just care about the money, all the money donated to Decipher goes back to Decipher. Website is currently under developing. trying to get us Old Host Back. Play Client For Now See U All Ingame --------------------->>>>>> https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/220769637/Decipher-RSPS.jar

item.title: Decipher-RSPS Flawless Uptime. Were Back Old Character Files
item.dc:creator: @ancientscape1 ancientscape1
item.description:
@ancientscape1 wrote:

Welcome To Decipher-RSPS… ---------->> Website is still Under Developing. Trying To Get Old Host-Domain Back. Fow Now Come Play At Us Client!
We See U All Online! https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/220769637/Decipher-RSPS.jar

Decipher is an Economy server:

This basically means there’s no spawning and any items people obtain will have been earned through PVM or from PKing. This means our items will have value, making everything more fun, giving players something to aim for and of course making it so much better when you finally get that kill for rare items. There are tons of different ways to exchange your items including specific market areas, clan chats, and even a dedicated section on forums. Being a new server we want to get our economy right the first time. To ensure we achieve this we have made drop rates at a perfect level to maintain item drops for PvMers, but also to give just enough that we’re not flooded with items and massive inflation like you see on most other private servers.

What Decipher is about:

Decipher community is like no other! As soon as you join you will notice our active wilderness, active forums, and active PvMing and Clanning communities. Here at Decipher RSPS, we don’t like to mess around, we want to bring you the players the best possible experience that we can give you.

Our community gives a warm welcome to all new players, and presents them with many opportunity to get involded with activities and get to know existing members. We have many events and tournaments in and out of the wilderness that makes this possible. These can be anything from Clan based PKing, to a simple games of Hide and Seek.

The Decipher Staff Team:

All of Decipher staff are hand-picked based off applications anyone is free to submit. These application then get voted on by our staff team and those few that provide the best application will get a chance to prove them selves by starting as a Server Support member. Not only do we make sure we have staff from EVERY different time zone. We make sure we have the nicest most helpful staff available for you. Many of our staff all have previous experience from other major private Server, mainly Near Reality, which means you get professional support and help when every you may need it.
